TopicTitle: KSP Experimental Team Applications are closed!

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Program, both the game and the community, grow infinitely more massive with every day you spend playing and with every commit the Developers make. We need you, the players, to help make it a more stable and polished game!

The Applications will be open until Monday the 8th of July. Please fill it out as accurately as possible, PM me if you have any questions, comments or concerns. Finally, please note that you must be at least 18 years of age to apply. Thank you.

Edited July 8, 2013 by Ted

Applications are now closed, I will be contacting those who's applications were approved, shortly. The applications turnout was far more than we expected, hitting far past triple figures and thus there were many that we just simply couldn't approve, despite wanting to. However, in the near future, when we want to further expand the Team, we will be sure to open up applications again and contact the the runners-up.

A massive thank you to all those who applied.

Edited July 8, 2013 by Ted
